Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 22-2009. A 59-year-old 
man with skin and pulmonary lesions after chemotherapy for leukemia [corrected].
Patterson TF(1), Mackool BT, Gilman MD, Piris A.

Author information:

San Antonio, and the South Texas Veterans Health Care System, San Antonio, USA.
